name: Pylon Pixel
description:
Pylon Pixel is a free 2D pixel platformer shooter game available on Windows, Linux, Android and even online!

Featuring over 50 levels, a story, achievements to unlock, an Endless Mode and more, Pylon Pixel is a really great experience!

It was developed by Alex_Sour, with help from Lynix for 3 of the levels to get the game released on time (not the YouTuber, but a Discord user of the same name) and released on the 30th of December, 2021.
